entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
I need to return a VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago, and it just doesn't work for me.
I understand. You'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #VF12345678. And honestly, I'm pretty annoyed. I expected more from this thing.
Thank you. I see your order here. You purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 1st. Let me check our return policy for smart watches and fitness trackers. Just one moment please.
Well, hurry up! I don't have all day. I thought these things were supposed to be amazing. The heart rate sensor is completely off! It's basically useless.

I apologize for the inconvenience. According to our return policy, you have 90 days from the purchase date to return an item for a full refund. So, you are well within that timeframe. The VeloBand Pulse qualifies for a return.

Ninety days? Are you sure? I thought I read something about a shorter window. I bought it specifically because it was a VeloBand Pulse, and needed something quick. I don't remember reading anything about 90 days. Are you sure this isn't some other return policy?

Yes, I am sure. Our standard return policy allows for returns up to 90 days from the date of purchase. However, certain promotional items may have their own set return policies. You are eligible for a full refund if you want to return your VeloBand Pulse smart watch.
Okay, well, if you're sure about the 90 days, then yes, I definitely want to return it. What's the process?

Certainly. I'll go ahead and generate a return shipping label for you. You'll receive it via email within the next hour. Simply repackage the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process your refund. It should reflect in your account within 7-10 business days.
Alright, that sounds good. Is there anything else I need to do?
No, that's all. Just keep an eye out for that email with the return label. We are so sorry that the VeloBand Pulse didn’t meet your expectations.

Okay, great. Thanks so much for your help! I appreciate you making this easy, especially since I was expecting some issues with it only being 15 days since I ordered it. I was worried about that 10 days thing I might have seen somewhere
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
You're welcome. Have a great day!
